td.content: s:F animal trainer aged 20 ys presents with severe flushing, severe abdominal cramps, Cancer. pt also reports of severe denial of any fever, blood per rectum or foul smelling stools. o:Height 60 in, Weight 152 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 102, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, Capsule endoscopy shows a large 7cm, ulcerated bulge was visualized in the mid jejunum a:Small Bowel Cancer p:administered Oxaliplatin - 130 mg/m2 IV, XELODA - 500 mg IV, performed Capsule endoscopy, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

s:patient presents with 6 months history of severe flushing. she is a 21 year old female animal trainer. o:Height 60 in, Weight 155 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, GI bleeding scan shows multiple site of bleeding within the small intestine a:Small Bowel Cancer p:administered Oxaliplatin - 130 mg/m2 IV, XELODA - 500 mg IV, performed GI bleeding scan, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
